meanings: mistake, error; (부주의한) blunder; (사소한) slip, make a mistake[blunder]

vlive.korean: 실수! it's a mistake! 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 릴렉스하게😌
[순간의 실수로 순식간에 밀려나는 냉정한 세계] 돌아갔어! [Got out of the race in a moment] I'm spinning! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Got out of the race in a moment] I'm spinning!

vlive.korean: 이렇게 실수해야지 사람지 그렇지? - 이거 보니까 이거는 자꾸 이거... People make mistakes like this. Right? - I think... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 코너 하나 뺏었습니다
vlive.english: People make mistakes like this. Right? - I think...

vlive.korean: 어 할 수 있어 - 계속할 수 있는데 실수하면 아웃이에요 - 실수하면 아웃이야? Yes. - You can continue, but you're out when you get wrong. - Really? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 코너 하나 뺏었습니다
vlive.english: Yes. - You can continue, but you're out when you get wrong. - Really?

vlive.korean: 실수잖아! It was a mistake! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] THE BOYZ X Rooftop Live - 더보이즈의 루프탑라이브!

examples.korean: He was loath to admit his mistake. 발음듣기 그는 자기 실수를 인정하기를 꺼렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was loath to admit his mistake. 발음

examples.korean: He drilled through the wall by mistake. 발음듣기 그가 실수로 벽에 구멍을 뚫었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He drilled through the wall by mistake. 발음

examples.korean: His mistake was due to youth and inexperience. 발음듣기 그의 실수는 어리고 경험이 부족해서 발생한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His mistake was due to youth and inexperience. 발음

examples.korean: A momentary lapse in the final set cost her the match. 발음듣기 마지막 세트에서의 순간적인 실수로 그녀는 그 시합에서 졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A momentary lapse in the final set cost her the match. 발음

examples.korean: It’s a common mistake 발음듣기 그것은 흔한[많은 사람들이 범하는] 실수이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
